author: Prasant1993
body:
#### PR description:

Backport of PR #42726. See description there. 

#### PR validation:

Same as PR #42726. 

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

Backport required for processing of 2022 and 2023 data/MC which will happen in 13_0_X.
title: [13_0_X backport] Fall17V2 Electron IDs and Isolations saved only in Run2 Nanos
